title: 4 Takeaways From the Last Kemp-Abrams Debate Before Election Day
description: The debate in Georgia between Gov. Brian Kemp, a Republican, and his Democratic challenger, Stacey Abrams, was structured to be heavy on policy â€” and that it was.
dc:creator: Reid J. Epstein and Maya King
media:description: Gov. Brian Kemp and Stacey Abrams, at their debate on Sunday in Atlanta, gave Georgia voters a stark contrast on where they stand on the issues.
